text: James Philip Owens (January 16, 1934 â€“ September 8, 2020), nicknamed "Bear", was an American professional baseball right-handed pitcher and pitching coach. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) between and for the Philadelphia Phillies, Cincinnati Reds and Houston Astros. He was born in McKean County, Pennsylvania. Owens died on September 8, 2020 in Houston, Texas at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jim Owens at BR Bullpen *Jim Owens at Astros Daily *Jim Owens at Baseball Library *Jim Owens at Pura Pelota (Venezuelan Professional Baseball League) Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Houston Astros players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players
title: Jim Owens (baseball)
